user.title: Connect to Eltako ESR62PF-IP
user.description: Enter the connection details for your Eltako ESR62PF-IP device.

data_description.ip_address: The IPv4 address of your Eltako device
data_description.pop_credential: Proof of Possession credential for authentication

error.invalid_auth: Invalid PoP credential. Please check your credential and try again.
error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the device. Please check the IP address and ensure the device is reachable on your network.
error.timeout_connect: Connection timed out. Please check your network connection and try again.
error.ssl_error: SSL certificate error. The device may be using a self-signed certificate. This integration handles self-signed certificates automatically - please check your device connection.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This device is already configured. The combination of IP address and port must be unique.
